26 class ArmState(object):
27 
28  def __init__(self):
29  self.__hardware_version = rospy.get_param('~hardware_version')
30 
31  self.__joints_name = rospy.get_param("~joint_names")
32  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander.init - joint_controller_name: %s", self.__joints_name)
33 
34  # Getting reference frame from robot_commander.launch
35  self.__reference_frame = rospy.get_param("~reference_frame")
36  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander.init - reference_frame: %s", self.__reference_frame)
37 
38  self.__arm = None
39  self.__acceleration_scaling_factor = 1.0
40  self.__velocity_scaling_factor = 1.0
41  self.__velocity_percentage_scaling_factor = 100.0
42  self.__acceleration_percentage_scaling_factor = 100.0
43 
44  # specific values for ned2
45  if self.__hardware_version in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
46  self.__velocity_scaling_factor = 0.5
47  self.__acceleration_scaling_factor = 0.5
48  self.__velocity_percentage_scaling_factor = 200.0
49  self.__acceleration_percentage_scaling_factor = 200.0
50 
51  # Arm velocity/acceleration
52  self.__max_velocity_scaling_percentage = int(self.__velocity_scaling_factor *
53  self.__velocity_percentage_scaling_factor)
54 
55  self.__max_acceleration_scaling_percentage = int(self.__acceleration_scaling_factor *
56  self.__acceleration_percentage_scaling_factor)
57 
58  self.__max_velocity_scaling_factor_pub = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/max_velocity_scaling_factor',
59  Int32,
60  queue_size=10,
61  latch=True)
62 
63  self.__max_acceleration_scaling_factor_pub = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/max_acceleration_scaling_factor',
64  Int32,
65  queue_size=10,
66  latch=True)
67 
68  self.__publish_velocity_scaling_percentage()
69  self.__publish_acceleration_scaling_percentage()
70 
71  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/set_max_velocity_scaling_factor',
72  SetInt,
73  self.__callback_set_max_velocity_scaling_factor)
74 
75  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/set_acceleration_factor',
76  SetInt,
77  self.__callback_set_acceleration_factor)
78 
79  self.__write_custom_value_service = rospy.ServiceProxy("/niryo_robot/ttl_driver/send_custom_value",
80  WriteCustomValue)
81 
82  # Joint State
83  self.__joint_states = None
84  rospy.Subscriber('/joint_states', JointState, self.__callback_joint_states)
85 
86  # Check joint validity service (used for self collisions checking)
87  self.check_state_validity = rospy.ServiceProxy('check_state_validity', GetStateValidity)
88 
89  self.__learning_mode_on = None
90  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/state', Bool, self.__callback_sub_learning_mode)
91  self.__learning_mode_service = rospy.ServiceProxy("/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate", SetBool)
92 
93  self.__hardware_status = None
94  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_status',
95  HardwareStatus,
96  self.__callback_hardware_status)
97 
98  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/robot_state', RobotState, self.__callback_sub_robot_state)
99  self.__robot_state = None
100 
101  # Init move group
102  self.__init_move_group_commander()
103 
104  # First, get Parameters Validator for Arm
105  self.__arm_param_validator = ArmParametersValidator(rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot/robot_command_validation"))
106 
107  # Transform handler
108  self.__transform_handler = ArmTCPTransformHandler()
109 
110  # Publish robot state (position, orientation, tool)
111  self.__state_publisher = StatePublisher(self)
112 
113  # Kinematics
114  self.__kinematics = KinematicsHandler(self)

168  # -- Callbacks
169  def __callback_sub_robot_state(self, robot_state):
170  self.__robot_state = robot_state
171 
172  def __callback_joint_states(self, joint_states_msg):
173  self.__joint_states = list(joint_states_msg.position[:6])
174 
175  def __callback_sub_learning_mode(self, learning_mode):
176  self.__learning_mode_on = learning_mode.data
177 
178  def __callback_hardware_status(self, msg):
179  self.__hardware_status = msg
180 
181  def __callback_set_max_velocity_scaling_factor(self, req):
182  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander - __callback_set_max_velocity_scaling_factor: %d", req.value)
183 
184  if not 0 < req.value <= 200:
185  return {'status': CommandStatus.INVALID_PARAMETERS, 'message': 'Value must be between 1 and 200'}
186 
187  if 100 < req.value <= 200:
188  rospy.logwarn(
189  "ArmCommander - __callback_set_max_velocity_scaling_factor %d is above 100%%."
190  "You are now in the experimental mode of the robot",
191  req.value)
192 
193  try:
194  self.__set_max_velocity_scaling_percentage(req.value)
195 
196  # if acceleration is lower than 40% motors will not move
197  acceleration_percentage = max(40, req.value)
198  self.__set_max_acceleration_scaling_percentage(acceleration_percentage)
199 
200  RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ = 572.957795131
201  RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM = 9.549296586
202 
203  VEL_PROFILE_ADDR = 112
204  VEL_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN = 4
205  ACC_PROFILE_ADDR = 108
206  ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN = 4
207 
208  # write stepper velocity & acceleration profiles with scaled values
209  i = 1
210  STEPPER_ID_OFFSET = 1
211  stepper_param_ns = '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/joints_interface/steppers/stepper_'
212  while rospy.has_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) + '/v_max') and rospy.get_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) +
213  '/a_max'):
214  default_vmax = rospy.get_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) + '/v_max')
215  default_amax = rospy.get_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) + '/a_max')
216 
217  _id = i + STEPPER_ID_OFFSET
218  scaled_velocity = int(default_vmax * self.__velocity_scaling_factor * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM *
219  1000) # rpm to stepper value
220  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
221  value=scaled_velocity,
222  reg_address=VEL_PROFILE_ADDR,
223  byte_number=VEL_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
224  scaled_acceleration = int(default_amax * self.__acceleration_scaling_factor *
225  RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ / 214.577) # rpm2 to stepper value
226  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
227  value=scaled_acceleration,
228  reg_address=ACC_PROFILE_ADDR,
229  byte_number=ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
230  i = i + 1
231 
232  # write dxl velocity & acceleration profiles with scaled values
233  i = 1
234  DXL_ID_OFFSET = 4
235  dxl_param_ns = '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/joints_interface/dynamixels/dxl_'
236  while rospy.has_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) +
237  '/velocity_profile') and rospy.get_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) +
238  '/acceleration_profile'):
239  default_vmax = rospy.get_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) + '/velocity_profile')
240  default_amax = rospy.get_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) + '/acceleration_profile')
241 
242  _id = i + DXL_ID_OFFSET
243  scaled_velocity = int(default_vmax * self.__velocity_scaling_factor)
244  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
245  value=scaled_velocity,
246  reg_address=VEL_PROFILE_ADDR,
247  byte_number=VEL_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
248  scaled_acceleration = int(default_amax * self.__acceleration_scaling_factor)
249  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
250  value=scaled_acceleration,
251  reg_address=ACC_PROFILE_ADDR,
252  byte_number=ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
253  i = i + 1
254 
255  except ArmCommanderException as e:
256  return {'status': CommandStatus.ARM_COMMANDER_FAILURE, 'message': e.message}
257 
258  return {'status': CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'message': 'Success'}
259 
260  def __callback_set_acceleration_factor(self, req):
261  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander - __callback_set_acceleration_factor: %d", req.value)
262 
263  if not 0 < req.value <= 200:
264  return {'status': CommandStatus.INVALID_PARAMETERS, 'message': 'Value must be between 1 and 200'}
265 
266  if 100 < req.value <= 200:
267  rospy.logwarn(
268  "ArmCommander - __callback_set_acceleration_factor %d is above 100%%."
269  "You are now in the experimental mode of the robot",
270  req.value)
271 
272  try:
273  # if acceleration is lower than 40% motors will not move
274  acceleration_percentage = max(40, req.value)
275  self.__set_max_acceleration_scaling_percentage(acceleration_percentage)
276 
277  RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ = 572.957795131
278 
279  ACC_PROFILE_ADDR = 108
280  ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN = 4
281 
282  # write stepper velocity & acceleration profiles with scaled values
283  i = 1
284  STEPPER_ID_OFFSET = 1
285  stepper_param_ns = '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/joints_interface/steppers/stepper_'
286  while rospy.has_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) + '/a_max'):
287  default_amax = rospy.get_param(stepper_param_ns + str(i) + '/a_max')
288 
289  _id = i + STEPPER_ID_OFFSET
290  scaled_acceleration = int(default_amax * self.__acceleration_scaling_factor *
291  RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ / 214.577) # rpm2 to stepper value
292  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
293  value=scaled_acceleration,
294  reg_address=ACC_PROFILE_ADDR,
295  byte_number=ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
296  i = i + 1
297 
298  # write dxl velocity & acceleration profiles with scaled values
299  i = 1
300  DXL_ID_OFFSET = 4
301  dxl_param_ns = '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/joints_interface/dynamixels/dxl_'
302  while rospy.has_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) + '/acceleration_profile'):
303  default_amax = rospy.get_param(dxl_param_ns + str(i) + '/acceleration_profile')
304 
305  _id = i + DXL_ID_OFFSET
306  scaled_acceleration = int(default_amax * self.__acceleration_scaling_factor)
307  self.__write_custom_value_service(id=_id,
308  value=scaled_acceleration,
309  reg_address=ACC_PROFILE_ADDR,
310  byte_number=ACC_PROFILE_BYTE_LEN)
311  i = i + 1
312 
313  except ArmCommanderException as e:
314  return {'status': CommandStatus.ARM_COMMANDER_FAILURE, 'message': e.message}
315 
316  return {'status': CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'message': 'Success'}
317 
318  # -- Publishers call
319  def __publish_velocity_scaling_percentage(self):
320  """
321  Publish velocity scaling percentage
322  :return: None
323  """
324  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander.init - Velocity_scaling_percentage: %d", self.__max_velocity_scaling_percentage)
325  msg = Int32(data=self.__max_velocity_scaling_percentage)
326  self.__max_velocity_scaling_factor_pub.publish(msg)
327 
328  def __publish_acceleration_scaling_percentage(self):
329  """
330  Publish acceleration scaling percentage
331  :return: None
332  """
333  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander.init - Acceleration_scaling_percentage: %d",
334  self.__max_acceleration_scaling_percentage)
335  msg = Int32(data=self.__max_acceleration_scaling_percentage)
336  self.__max_acceleration_scaling_factor_pub.publish(msg)
337 
338  # -- Core
339  def __set_max_velocity_scaling_percentage(self, percentage):
340  """
341  Ask MoveIt to set the relative speed to (percentage)%
342  :param percentage:
343  :return: None
344  """
345  self.__max_velocity_scaling_percentage = percentage
346  self.__velocity_scaling_factor = percentage / self.__velocity_percentage_scaling_factor
347  self.__arm.set_max_velocity_scaling_factor(self.__velocity_scaling_factor)
348  self.__publish_velocity_scaling_percentage()
349 
350  def __set_max_acceleration_scaling_percentage(self, percentage):
351  """
352  Ask MoveIt to set the relative acceleration to (percentage)%
353  :param percentage:
354  :return: None
355  """
356  self.__max_acceleration_scaling_percentage = percentage
357  self.__acceleration_scaling_factor = percentage / self.__acceleration_percentage_scaling_factor
358  self.__arm.set_max_acceleration_scaling_factor(self.__acceleration_scaling_factor)
359  self.__publish_acceleration_scaling_percentage()
360 
361  def set_learning_mode(self, set_bool):
362  """
363  Activate or deactivate the learning mode using the ros service /niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate
364 
365  :param set_bool:
366  :type set_bool: bool
367 
368  :return: Success if the learning mode was properly activate or deactivate, False if not
369  :rtype: bool
370  """
371  if set_bool and self.__hardware_version in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
372  return True
373  try:
374  return self.__learning_mode_service(set_bool).status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS
375  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
376  return False
377 
378  def force_learning_mode(self, set_bool):
379  """
380  Activate or deactivate the learning mode using the ros service /niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate
381 
382  :param set_bool:
383  :type set_bool: bool
384 
385  :return: Success if the learning mode was properly activate or deactivate, False if not
386  :rtype: bool
387  """
388  try:
389  return self.__learning_mode_service(set_bool).status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS
390  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
391  return False
392 
393  def __init_move_group_commander(self):
394  # Get Arm MoveGroupCommander
395  move_group_commander_name = rospy.get_param("~move_group_commander_name")
396  rospy.logdebug("ArmCommander.init - move_group_commander_name: %s", move_group_commander_name)
397 
398  self.__arm = moveit_commander.MoveGroupCommander(move_group_commander_name, wait_for_servers=30.0)
399 
400  # Set pose reference frame
401  self.__arm.set_pose_reference_frame(self.__reference_frame)
402  self.__arm.set_max_velocity_scaling_factor(self.__velocity_scaling_factor)
403  self.__arm.set_max_acceleration_scaling_factor(self.__acceleration_scaling_factor)
404 
405  # Set planning parameters
406  self.__arm.allow_replanning(rospy.get_param("~allow_replanning"))
407  self.__arm.set_goal_joint_tolerance(rospy.get_param("~goal_joint_tolerance"))
408  self.__arm.set_goal_position_tolerance(rospy.get_param("~goal_position_tolerance"))
409  self.__arm.set_goal_orientation_tolerance(rospy.get_param("~goal_orientation_tolerance"))
410 
411  rospy.loginfo("Arm commander - MoveIt! successfully connected to move_group '{}'".format(self.__arm.get_name()))
412  rospy.logdebug("Arm commander - MoveIt! will move '{}' in the planning_frame '{}'".format(
413  self.__arm.get_end_effector_link(), self.__arm.get_planning_frame()))
